verses.verse: Moreover the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Take <S%H3947><s%> you a great <S%H1419><s%> roll, <S%H1549><s%> and write <S%H3789><s%> in it with a man's <S%H582><s%> pen <S%H2747><s%> concerning Mahershalalhashbaz. <S%H4122><s%>

And I took to me faithful <S%H539><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%> to record, <S%H5749><s%> Uriah <S%H223><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeberechiah. <S%H3000><s%>

And I went <S%H7126><s%> to the prophetess; <S%H5031><s%> and she conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%> Then said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to me, Call <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Mahershalalhashbaz. <S%H4122><s%>

For before <S%H2962><s%> the child <S%H5288><s%> shall have knowledge <S%H3045><s%> to cry, <S%H7121><s%> My father, <S%H1><s%> and my mother, <S%H517><s%> the riches <S%H2428><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%> and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%> shall be taken <S%H5375><s%> away before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria. <S%H804><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> also to me again, <S%H3254><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

For as much <S%H3282><s%> <S%H365><s%> as this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> refuses <S%H3988><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Shiloah <S%H7975><s%> that go <S%H1980><s%> softly, <S%H328><s%> and rejoice <S%H4885><s%> in Rezin <S%H7526><s%> and Remaliah's <S%H7425><s%> son; <S%H1121><s%>

Now therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> brings <S%H5927><s%> up on them the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the river, <S%H5104><s%> strong <S%H6099><s%> and many, <S%H7227><s%> even <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his glory: <S%H3519><s%> and he shall come <S%H5927><s%> up over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his channels, <S%H650><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his banks: <S%H1415><s%>

And he shall pass <S%H2498><s%> through Judah; <S%H3063><s%> he shall overflow <S%H7857><s%> and go <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> he shall reach <S%H5060><s%> even to the neck; <S%H6677><s%> and the stretching <S%H4298><s%> out of his wings <S%H3671><s%> shall fill <S%H4393><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of your land, <S%H776><s%> O Immanuel. <S%H6005><s%>

Associate <S%H7489><s%> yourselves, O you people, <S%H5971><s%> and you shall be broken <S%H2844><s%> in pieces; and give ear, <S%H238><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you of far <S%H4801><s%> countries: <S%H776><s%> gird <S%H247><s%> yourselves, and you shall be broken <S%H2844><s%> in pieces; gird <S%H247><s%> yourselves, and you shall be broken <S%H2844><s%> in pieces.
Take counsel <S%H6098><s%> together, and it shall come to nothing; <S%H6565><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> the word, <S%H1697><s%> and it shall not stand: <S%H6965><s%> for God <S%H410><s%> is with us.

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> to me with a strong <S%H2393><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and instructed <S%H3256><s%> me that I should not walk <S%H3212><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> you not, A confederacy, <S%H7195><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> them to whom <S%H834><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> A confederacy; <S%H7195><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> you their fear, <S%H4172><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> be afraid. <S%H6206><s%>
Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> himself; and let him be your fear, <S%H4172><s%> and let him be your dread. <S%H6206><s%>

And he shall be for a sanctuary; <S%H4720><s%> but for a stone <S%H68><s%> of stumbling <S%H5063><s%> and for a rock <S%H6697><s%> of offense <S%H4383><s%> to both <S%H8147><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for a gin <S%H6341><s%> and for a snare <S%H4170><s%> to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
And many <S%H7227><s%> among them shall stumble, <S%H3782><s%> and fall, <S%H5307><s%> and be broken, <S%H7665><s%> and be snared, <S%H3369><s%> and be taken. <S%H3920><s%>
Bind <S%H6887><s%> up the testimony, <S%H8584><s%> seal <S%H2856><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%> among my disciples. <S%H3928><s%>
And I will wait <S%H2442><s%> on the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that hides <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and I will look <S%H6960><s%> for him.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I and the children <S%H3206><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> me are for signs <S%H226><s%> and for wonders <S%H4159><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> which dwells <S%H7931><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

And when <S%H3588><s%> they shall say <S%H559><s%> to you, Seek <S%H1875><s%> to them that have familiar spirits, <S%H178><s%> and to wizards <S%H3049><s%> that peep, <S%H6850><s%> and that mutter: <S%H1897><s%> should not a people <S%H5971><s%> seek <S%H1875><s%> to their God? <S%H430><s%> for the living <S%H2416><s%> to the dead? <S%H4191><s%>

To the law <S%H8451><s%> and to the testimony: <S%H8584><s%> if <S%H518><s%> they speak <S%H559><s%> not according to this <S%H2088><s%> word, <S%H1697><s%> it is because <S%H834><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> light <S%H7837><s%> in them.

And they shall pass <S%H5674><s%> through it, hardly <S%H7185><s%> bestead and hungry: <S%H7456><s%> and it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that when <S%H3588><s%> they shall be hungry, <S%H7456><s%> they shall fret <S%H7107><s%> themselves, and curse <S%H7043><s%> their king <S%H4428><s%> and their God, <S%H430><s%> and look <S%H6437><s%> upward. <S%H4605><s%>

And they shall look <S%H5027><s%> to the earth; <S%H776><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> trouble <S%H6869><s%> and darkness, <S%H2825><s%> dimness <S%H4588><s%> of anguish; <S%H6695><s%> and they shall be driven <S%H5080><s%> to darkness. <S%H653><s%>
